Verses: 1 pinbu Yesu Janangalaiyum Thammudaiya Seeshargalaiyum Nokki:
2 vedhapaaragarum, Pariseyarum Moseyinudaiya Aasanaththil Utkaarndhirukkiraargal;
3 aagaiyaal, Neengal Kaikkollumpadi Avargal Ungalukku Sollugira Yaavaiyum Kaikkondu Seyyungal; Avargal Seykaiyinpadiyo Seyyaadhirungal; Enenil, Avargal Sollugiraargal, Solliyum Seyyaadhirukkiraargal.
4 sumappadharkariya Paaramaana Sumaigalaikkatti Manushar Tholgalinmel Sumaththugiraargal; Thaangalo Oru Viralinaalum Avaigalaith Thodamaattaargal.
5 thangal Kiriyaigalellaam Manushar Kaanavendumendru Seygiraargal; Thangal Kaappunaadaakkalai Agalamaakki, Thangal Vasthirangalin Thongalgalaip Peridhaakki,
6 virundhugalil Mudhanmaiyaana Idangalaiyum, Jeba Aalayangalil Mudhanmaiyaana Aasanangalaiyum,
7 sandhaiveligalil Vandhanangalaiyum, Manusharaal Rabee, Rabee Endru Azhaikkappaduvadhaiyum Virumpugiraargal:
8 neengalo Rabee Endrazhaikkappadaadhirungal; Kiristhu Oruvare Ungalukkup Podhagaraayirukkiraar; Neengal Ellaarum Sagodhararaayirukkireergal.
9 boomiyile Oruvanaiyum Ungal Pidhaa Endru Sollaadhirungal; Paralogaththilirukkira Oruvare Ungalukkup Pidhaavaayirukkiraar.
10 neengal Gurukkal Endrum Azhaikkappadaadhirungal; Kiristhu Oruvare Ungalukkuk Guruvaayirukkiraar.
11 ungalil Periyavanaayirukkiravan Ungalukku Oozhiyakkaaranaayirukkakkadavan.
12 thannai Uyarththugiravan Thaazhththappaduvaan, Thannaith Thaazhththugiravan Uyarththappaduvaan.

13 maayakkaararaagiya Vedhapaaragare! Pariseyare! Ungalukku Aiyo, Manushar Piravesiyaadhapadi Paralogaraajyaththaip Poottippodugireergal; Neengal Adhil Piravesikkiradhumillai Piravesikkap Pogiravargalaip Piravesikkavidugiradhumillai.
14 maayakkaararaagiya Vedhapaaragare! Pariseyare! Ungalukku Aiyo, Paarvaikkaaga Neenda Jebampanni, Vidhavaigalin Veedugalaip Patchiththuppodugireergal; Idhinimiththam Adhiga Aakkinaiyai Adaiveergal.

15 maayakkaararaagiya Vedhapaarakare! Pariseyare! Ungalukku Aiyo, Oruvanai Ungal Maarkkaththaanaakkumpadi Samuththiraththaiyum Boomiyaiyum Sutriththirikireergal; Avan Ungal Maarkkaththaanaanapodhu Avanai Ungalilum Rattippaai Naragaththin Maganaakkugireergal.

16 kurudaraana Vazhikaattigale! Ungalukku Aiyo, Evanaagilum Dhevaalayaththinperil Saththiyampanninaal Adhinaal Ondrumillaiyendrum, Evanaagilum Dhevaalayaththin Ponninperil Saththiyampanninaal Avan Kadanaaliyendrum Sollugireergal.
17 madhikedare, Kurudare! Edhu Mukkiyam? Ponno, Ponnaip Parisuththamaakkugira Dhevaalayamo?
18 melum, Evanaagilum Balipeedaththin Peril Saththiyampanninaal Adhinaal Ondrumillaiyendrum, Evanaagilum Adhinmel Irukkira Kaanikkaiyinmel Saththiyampanninaal Avan Kadanaali Endrum Sollugireergal.
19 madhikedare, Kurudare! Edhu Mukkiyam? Kaanikkaiyo, Kaanikkaiyaip Parisuththamaakkugira Balipeedamo?
20 aagaiyaal, Balipeedaththinperil Saththiyam Pannugiravan Adhin Perilum Adhinmelulla Ellaavatrinperilum Saththiyampannugiraan.
21 dhevaalayaththinperil Saththiyampannugiravan Adhinperilum Adhil Vaasamaayirukkiravarperilum Saththiyampannugiraan.
22 vaanaththin Peril Saththiyam Pannugiravan Dhevanudaiya Singaasanaththin Perilum Adhil Veetrirukkiravar Perilum Saththiyam Pannugiraan.

23 maayakkaararaagiya Vedhapaaragare! Pariseyare! Ungalukku Aiyo, Neengal Ordhalaamilum Vendhayaththilum Seeragaththilum Thasamapaagam Seluththi, Niyaayappiramaanaththil Karpiththirukkira Viseshiththavaigalaagiya Needhiyaiyum Irakkaththaiyum Visuvaasaththaiyum Vittuvitteergal; Ivaikalaiyum Seyyavendum, Avaikalaiyum Vitaadhirukkavendum.
24 kurudaraana Vazhikaattigale, Kosukillaadhapadi Vadikatti, Ottakaththai Vizhungugiravargalaayirukkireergal.

25 maayakkaararaagiya Vedhapaaragare! Pariseyare! Ungalukku Aiyo, Pojanapaanapaaththirangalin Velippuraththai Suththamaakkugireergal; Utpuraththilo Avaigal Kollaiyinaalum, Aneedhaththinaalum Niraindhirukkiradhu.
26 kurudanaana Pariseyane! Pojanapaanapaaththirangalin Velippuram Suththamaakumpadi Avaigalin Utpuraththai Mudhalaavadhu Suththamaakku.

27 maayakkaararaagiya Vedhapaaragare! Pariseyare! Ungalukku Aiyo, Vellaiyadikkappatta Kallaraigalukku Oppaayirukkireergal., Avaigal Purampe Alangaaramaaik Kaanappadum, Ulleyo Mariththavargalin Elumpugalinaalum Sagala Asuththaththinaalum Niraindhirukkum.
28 appadiye Neengalum Manusharukku Needhimaangal Endru Purambe Kaanappadugireergal; Ullaththilo Maayaththinaalum Akkiramaththinaalum Niraindhirukkireergal.
29 maayakkaararaagiya Vedhapaarakare! Pariseyare! Ungalukku Aiyo, Neengal Theerkkadharisigalin Kallaraigalaik Katti, Needhimaangalin Samaadhigalai Singaariththu,
30 engal Pidhaakkalin Naatkalil Irundhomaanaal, Avargalode Naangal Theerkkadharisigalin Raththappazhikku Udanpattirukkamaattom Engireergal.
31 aagaiyaal, Theerkkadharisigalaik Kolai Seydhavargalukkup Puththiraraayirukkireergal Endru Ungalaikkuriththu Neengale Saatchigalaayirukkireergal.
32 neengalum Ungal Pidhaakkalin Akkirama Alavai Nirappungal.
33 sarppangale, Viriyanpaampukkuttigale! Narakaakkinaikku Eppadith Thappiththukkolveergal?

34 aagaiyaal, Idho, Theerkkadharisigalaiyum Gnaanigalaiyum Vedhapaaragaraiyum Ungalidaththile Anuppugiren; Avargalil Silaraik Kondru Siluvaigalil Araiveergal, Silarai Ungal Aalayangalin Vaarinaal Adiththu, Oorukku Oor Thunbapaduththuveergal.

35 needhimaanaagiya Aabelin Raththam Mudhal Dhevaalayaththukkum Balipeedaththukkum Naduve Neengal Kolaiseydha Parakiyaavin Kumaaranaagiya Sagariyaavin Raththamvaraikkum, Boomiyinmel Sindhappatta Needhimaangalin Raththappazhiyellaam Ungalmel Varumpadiyaaga Ippadi Seyveergal.
36 ivaigalellaam Indha Sandhadhiyaarmel Varumendru Meyyaagave Ungalukku Sollugiren.

37 erusaleme, Erusaleme, Theerkkadharisigalaik Kolaiseydhu, Unnidaththil Anuppappattavargalaik Kallerigiravale! Kozhi Than Kunjugalaith Than Siragugalinkeezhe Kootti Serththukkollumvannamaaga Naan Eththanaidharamo Un Pillaigalai Koottich Serththukkolla Manadhaayirundhen; Ungalukko Manadhillaamarpoyitru.
38 idho, Ungal Veedu Ungalukkup Paazhaakkividappadum.
39 karththarudaiya Naamaththinaale Varugiravar Sthoththirikkappattavar Endru Neengal Sollumalavum Idhumudhal Ennaik Kaanaadhiruppeergal Endru Ungalukku Sollugiren Endraar.
